text: De, yila balañjun bɨndefop ŋɨmeve, yila pɨndaŋ ŋɨmeve. Valan kavik fofonombe akɨtve galaveve, “Ñen Got akɨtva! Got, dɨn waiŋgeve pave katɨk ñetɨk Gasak Wakɨnkɨk wuŋdi ŋɨmale balañjɨktɨk!11.9 Kavɨla wulutɨle wokok juñjuŋamalɨn kavik tonma, Gotɨn Jisas apɨsukuveve wokok wulu pavaŋga pave. “Gotɨn waiŋgeve pava wokok wun apɨsukuvale balañjɨktɨk.”
